class.name: ImportAction
class.documentation: Import facilities allow users to import external graphics files (jpeg/gif/eps)

parameter.name: service
parameter.documentation: Metview info : which service created this image

parameter.name: url
parameter.documentation: Metview info : which url created this image : add it in the titles

parameter.name: layers
parameter.documentation: Metview info :Short name to be put in the layers!
